task: Develop a comprehensive and adaptive security management system for a futuristic office building. The system should integrate surveillance analytics, biometric access control, energy consumption optimization, guided evacuation protocols, environmental health monitoring, and generate a weekly security and environmental report. It should handle real-time adjustments and predictive maintenance based on data analytics.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The primary interface agent that manages requests and orchestrates the security and environmental operations in the office building.

agents.name: security_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees all security protocols, coordinates various sub-agents to support an adaptive and comprehensive security system.

agents.name: surveillance_center_agent
agents.role: Monitors and analyzes video feeds to ensure security and safety in the building.

agents.name: video_analytics_agent
agents.role: Analyzes video data for unusual or suspicious activities within the premises.

agents.name: pattern_recognition_agent
agents.role: Utilizes machine learning to identify suspicious patterns in surveillance data.

agents.name: face_recognition_agent
agents.role: Performs facial recognition to identify authorized personnel and potential intruders.

agents.name: biometric_access_agent
agents.role: Manages biometric authentication systems for secure access to different areas of the building.

agents.name: access_approval_agent
agents.role: Authorizes or denies access based on biometric data and security protocols.

agents.name: energy_management_agent
agents.role: Optimizes energy consumption and efficiency throughout the building.

agents.name: energy_optimizer_agent
agents.role: Analyzes energy usage patterns to enhance efficiency.

agents.name: distribution_control_agent
agents.role: Controls the distribution of energy loads in response to real-time data.

agents.name: evacuation_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Develops and manages evacuation plans for emergency situations.

agents.name: evacuation_strategy_agent
agents.role: Creates optimized routes and guidance for building evacuations.

agents.name: environmental_monitor_agent
agents.role: Monitors environmental health indicators to ensure a safe and sustainable building environment.

agents.name: air_quality_agent
agents.role: Analyzes air quality metrics to maintain a healthy indoor environment.

agents.name: water_quality_agent
agents.role: Checks and reports the water quality standards compliance within the building.

agents.name: reporting_center_agent
agents.role: Compiles and presents comprehensive reports on the building's security and environmental metrics.

agents.name: weekly_summary_report_agent
agents.role: Generates a detailed weekly report summarizing the performance of all security and environmental systems.

agents.name: maintenance_planning_agent
agents.role: Coordinates predictive maintenance activities to prevent system failures.

agents.name: predictive_maintenance_agent
agents.role: Uses predictive analytics to schedule and optimize maintenance activities.

agents.name: cyber_security_agent
agents.role: Ensures digital security by monitoring network activities and preventing cyber threats.

agents.name: network_monitor_agent
agents.role: Monitors network traffic and detects anomalies that could indicate security threats.

agents.name: intrusion_detection_agent
agents.role: Detects and alerts on any unauthorized access attempts or suspicious activities within the digital network.

tools.name: suspicious_activity_detector_tool
tools.description: Detects and flags unusual or suspicious activities from video surveillance data.

camera_id.description: Identifier for the camera capturing the footage.

analysis_duration.description: Duration in minutes over which to perform the analysis.

tools.name: fingerprint_scanner_tool
tools.description: Scans and verifies fingerprints for authorization of building access.

door_id.description: The identification code for the door being accessed.

user_id.description: Unique ID of the user attempting access.

tools.name: load_distribution_tool
tools.description: Distributes energy load effectively across the building's grid systems.

zone_id.description: Identifier for the specific energy zone.

priority_level.description: The priority level for energy distribution (higher means more priority).

tools.name: path_finder_tool
tools.description: Optimizes and suggests evacuation routes based on the current building layout and emergency exits.

emergency_type.description: The type of emergency (e.g., fire, earthquake).

occupancy_data.description: Data about current occupants in each floor or area.

tools.name: carbon_footprint_calculator_tool
tools.description: Calculates and reports the carbon footprint based on current air quality data.

sampling_frequency.description: Frequency of data sampling in hours.

include_outdoor_readings.description: Whether to include outdoor air quality readings in the calculation.

tools.name: compile_weekly_report_tool
tools.description: Generates a comprehensive report detailing security and environmental performance metrics over the week.

start_date.description: Start date for the report period.

end_date.description: End date for the report period.

items.description: Sections like 'security', 'energy', 'environment' to be included in the report.
